description:
Her Jingu is "Kinben" which utilizes the power of lightning and takes the form of a whip split into two. Yan Min fuses the equipment into her body, which enables her to use "Reirii" in turn increasing her speed, She can also increase the speed of the transmission of her neural signals reducing her reaction time.
Another ability of hers is "Reichin" or "Thunder Fist", which turns her fists into pure lightning, increasing her power.
name: Yan Min
